data.text: Then Job replied,
“Yes, I certainly know that much of what you said is true.
If someone wanted to argue with God about that,
God is very wise [IDM] and very powerful;
He even moves mountains, without them (OR, anyone) knowing about it.
He sends earthquakes that shake the ground;
Some days he speaks to the sun, and it does not rise,
He alone ◄stretched out/put in place► the sky;
He put in their places the clusters/groups of stars that are called The Dipper/Bear, Orion, the Pleiades, and the stars in the southern sky.
Only he does great things that we cannot understand;
He passes by where I am, but I do not see him;
If he wants to snatch something away, no one [RHQ] can hinder him;
God will not very easily stop being angry;
“So, if God took me to court,
Even though I ◄would be innocent/would not have done what is wrong►, I would not be able to answer him.
If I summoned him to come to the courtroom and he said that he would come,
He sends storms to batter me,
It is as though he will not let me get/catch my breath,
If I would try to ◄wrestle with/fight against► him, there is no way that I could defeat him,
Even though I was innocent, what I would say would cause him to say that I must be punished [MTY];
“I have not done what is wrong, but that is not important.
But it doesn’t matter,
When people experience disaster and it causes them to suddenly die,
God has allowed wicked people to control what happens in the world.
“My days go by very quickly, like a fast runner;
My life goes by very rapidly, like a boat made from reeds sailing swiftly,
If I smile and say to God, ‘I will forget what I am complaining about;
then I become afraid because of all that I am suffering,
He will ◄condemn me/declare that I should be punished►,
If I washed myself with snow
he would still throw me into a filthy pit;
“God is not a human, as I am,
There is no one to ◄mediate/hear us and decide who is right►,
I wish/desire that he would stop punishing [MTY] me,
If he did that, I would declare that I am innocent without being afraid of him,
